title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message:
This board will not power.
PPBUS - 12.28V
SMC_adapter_en - 0V
Green light present
SCL and SDA at battery connector at 3.48V

I replaced ISL6259 and later SMC with same one from same board and I have still PPBUS - 12.28V

Anything more I can check?

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message: Seems a bad soldering job on ISL or still a bad SMC........  Also remove BIL if it is still on...

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message: It should power on with PPBUS at 12.3V anyway. SMC issue is suspected. What is diode mode on both data pins on the battery connector?

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message:
Bettery connector

pin4 - 1.899 and 0.559
pin6 - .0L and 0.556

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message: Those values are close enough. What is the history on this board?

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message: Customer told me liquide damage 2 month ago and somebody repaired lvds connector. It works 2 months and 1 week ago didnot power anymore.

title: 820-3115 ppbus - 12.28V
message:
Well, I forgot to tell that before replacing the SMC first time I had 1V at pin 4 and 3.48V at pin 6 
After SMC was reflowed and later replaced I had 3.48V in both 4 and 6 pins (battery connector) scl and sda.
